description: Test Harbor (HF Spaces) integration with a simple LLM call

cells.name: ask_llama
cells.instructions:
Use the llama_chat tool to answer the user's question: {{ input.question }}

Call the tool with:
- message: the question
- system_prompt: 'You are a helpful assistant. Be concise and direct.'

cells.name: reflect
cells.instructions: The previous phase asked Llama a question and got an answer. Provide a brief reflection on the quality of the response - was it accurate and helpful?
